column4: heya.. first time ubuntu user here.. excellent work people, outstanding distro

i have a question.. i'm not that knowledgeable in recent linux distros so i have a fairly poor understanding of apt-get and such, but i wanted to change my installed applications dir to another partition.. how can i do this?
i'm using Synaptic and updated Ubuntu.. @ska-fan: yea, basically.. i just want to transfer all installed apps to another partition..
